original_text:
For great is his steadfast love toward us,
    and the faithfulness of the Lord endures forever.
Praise the Lord!
korean_text: 우리에게 향하신 여호와의 인자하심이 크시고 여호와의 진실하심이 영원함이로다 할렐루야

sentences.original_text: For great is his steadfast love toward us,
and the faithfulness of the Lord endures forever.
